Package simulator

This package contains general interface that provides simulation required services, Simulator. Any kind of simulation should implement its methods.

This package also provides the more specific case of EventSimulator, where simulation time jumps from Event to Event. A general, EventSimulator, and specific, PEC, type of container are given for this case, also being provided in whis package the EventComparatorByTime used in the implementation of the container.

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventContainer
    This interface provides services related to any Event container: adding Events, removing, calling next Event or checking if container is empty.
    Simulator
    This interfaces provides services related to any simulation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Event
    This abstract class provides the general case of every time Event.
    EventComparatorByTime
    This Comparator is used to compare Events by their time, to sort them in the PEC.
    EventSimulator
    This abstract class implements the Simulator, providing a general simulator of time Events.
    PEC
    This class implements EventContainer, specifying criteria for sorting the Events and which is the next in line.
